channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Associated Files Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Associated Files Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45401|2024-08-03T14:09:57.038Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20associated%20files%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Associated Files Plugin 0.2.1 and earlier does not escape names of associated files, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
